name: Stuck in the Dark
description:
Stuck In The Dark is a short university project made in early 2018, but now uploaded to Itch.io with additional features. Created by Ethan Chan, Simon Ma, and Rehan Theiveehathasan.

Collect all the keys and return to the exit to escape!

Controls

PausePMovementWASD
Arrow Keys
Flashlight Toggle
QSonarEPickup item
Space

Stuff To Be Added:

  • Pause menu
  • Death & Win screens
  • Stat tracking

3rd Party assets used:

  • Character Monster 1 by Solum Knight
  • Free Horror Game Kit by Two TV Game Studio
  • Hospital Horror Pack by FoeJofMay
  • NoMansScanner by Broxxar

  • Breathing by RICHERlandTV

  • Click by Goup_1

  • Eerie Ambience by Bradovic
  • Eerie Shimmer by be-steele
  • hurt1.wav by thecheeseman
  • Indra Call.wav by .Andre_Onate
  • Magic by RICHERlandTV
  • Swing Samurai Sword.aif by nextmaking
  • UI Confirmation Alert, B4.wav by Inspector J (Modified)
  • Victory Sound 1.wav by SilverIllusionist (Modified)
